meanings.sent1: I will resynthesize the ingredients to make a better cake.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often resynthesize compounds to study their properties.
meanings.sent3: After the mix-up, I had to resynthesize my shopping list.
meanings.sent4: She had to resynthesize her thoughts before making a decision.
meanings.sent5: The artist had to resynthesize the colors to get the perfect shade.

meanings.definition: To combine elements to form a new whole.
meanings.sent1: Let's resynthesize these ideas to create a stronger argument.
meanings.sent2: Designers resynthesize different fabrics to make unique clothing.
meanings.sent3: I had to resynthesize my schedule to fit in the new activity.
meanings.sent4: The team had to resynthesize their strategies for the final game.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to resynthesize the flavors to create a delicious dish.
